response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $1,500,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a significant return on our investment. We believe this price reflects the true worth of the product and offers you a substantial advantage. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
